title: Agar.io
description: In this muti-part coding challenge, I create a clone of the multiplayer online game Agar.io with JavaScript, node.js and websockets.

parts.title: Agar.io - Part 2 (Networking with Socket.IO and Node.js)

codeExamples.title: Agar.io - Part 1 (Basic Game Mechanics)
codeExamples.description: This sketch implements the basic game mechanics of the game Agar.io.

codeExamples.title: Agar.io - Part 2 (Networking with Socket.IO and Node.js)
codeExamples.description: This project sets up a server so that visitors are able to compete in a version of the game Agar.io.

links.title: Agar.io
links.description: Control your cell and eat other players to grow larger! Play with millions of players around the world and try to become the biggest cell of all!
